feed.title: Alyson’s Page
feed.subtitle: This is my website. I hope that I can show you some things that I learned from my experience as a fullstack developer.

entry.title: About me
entry.content:
Hi, my name is Alyson and I am a computer engineer. I studied at a Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (ITA), one of the most important universities of Brazil.

I have always liked technology, and now I starting a blog about things I like to do and learn. I hope you enjoy my posts and like their contents.
entry.summary: Hi, my name is Alyson and I am a computer engineer. I studied at a Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (ITA), one of the most important universities of Brazil.
